text: I’m thinking about trying to develop a 2D game engine as a hobby project. It will most likely take quite some time to develop. I wanted to ask you guys if you think Julia would be suitable for this type of project? I’m thinking that I could greatly benefit from the possibility of making C-calls. I’m really interested in Julia and i’ve done some small things with it and I feel like this type of project would be perfect for learning more!

elements.text: I’m thinking about trying to develop a 2D game engine as a hobby project. It will most likely take quite some time to develop. text: might be. u can check out GameZero.jl and there are some low level C libraries that have binding in Julai like simpledirectmedialayer2.jl

text: there is the <#CST8AJNE4|game-dev> channel for u as well

There was a long discussion on game dev. on zulip recently
